entry.name: cisco-sxp
entry.description: The Security Group Tag (SGT) Exchange Protocol (SXP) is one of several protocols that supports Cisco TrustSec. SXP is a control protocol for propagating IP-to-SGT binding information across network devices that do not have the capability to tag packets.

entry.name: coinimp
entry.description: Coinimp is a javascript miner that is embedded in websites and uses CPU resources while you visit such sites to mine the monero cryptocurrency. This App-ID identifies such mining activity giving you the ability to get visibility into such traffic and block it in an enterprise environment.

entry.name: ed137-ptt-off-squ-off
entry.description: Indicates if ED-137 PTT is OFF and SQU is OFF.

entry.name: ed137-base
entry.description: ED-137 is an interoperability standard for VoIP Air Traffic Management (ATM) radio components developed by The European Organisation for Civil Aviation Equipment (EUROCAE).

entry.name: ed137
entry.description: ED-137 is an interoperability standard for VoIP Air Traffic Management (ATM) radio components developed by The European Organisation for Civil Aviation Equipment (EUROCAE).

entry.name: ed137-ptt-off-squ-on
entry.description: Indicates if ED-137 PTT is OFF and SQU is ON.

entry.name: ed137-ptt-on-squ-off
entry.description: Indicates if ED-137 PTT is ON and SQU is OFF.

entry.name: ed137-ptt-on-squ-on
entry.description: Indicates if ED-137 PTT is ON and SQU is ON.

entry.name: gb2pp-ptt-off
entry.description: Indicates GB2PP PTT OFF signal.

entry.name: gb2pp-base
entry.description: GB2PP is a signaling protocol for Rohde&Schwarz radio stations. It is used to set and retrieve parameters and states to/from radio stations.

entry.name: gb2pp
entry.description: GB2PP is a signaling protocol for Rohde&Schwarz radio stations. It is used to set and retrieve parameters and states to/from radio stations.

entry.name: gb2pp-ptt-on
entry.description: Indicates GB2PP PTT ON signal.

entry.name: gb2pp-tone-off
entry.description: Indicates GB2PP Tone OFF signal.

entry.name: gb2pp-tone-on
entry.description: Indicates GB2PP Tone ON signal.

entry.name: globus
entry.description: Globus Connect enables your system to use the Globus file transfer and sharing service. It makes your machine into a Globus endpoint on practically any system. This App-ID covers Globus Connect Personal, which is designed for use by a single user on a personal machine, and Globus Web Console.

entry.name: helprace
entry.description: Helprace is a tool for customer service support. This app-id covers traffic between the helprace browser client and the helprace servers.

entry.name: helpscout
entry.description: Help Scout is a help desk software providing an email-based customer support platform, knowledge base tool, and an embeddable search/contact widget for customer service professionals. This app-id controls traffic from the helpscout web-client or mobile phone app to the helpscout servers.

entry.name: hpe-bsa
entry.description: BSA(Business Server Automation) HPE Server Automation (HPE SA) automates tasks like provisioning, patching, configuring, and release management of servers and application servers. Server Automation (SA) is a data center automation software that centralizes and streamlines many data center functions and automates critical areas of data center\'s server management.

entry.name: ipfs
entry.description: InterPlanetary File System (IPFS) is a protocol and network designed to create a content-addressable, peer-to-peer method of storing and sharing hypermedia in a distributed file system. IPFS aims to replace HTTP and provide web service without centralization.

entry.name: kafka
entry.description: Apache Kafka is an open-source stream-processing software platform developed by the Apache Software Foundation, written in Scala and Java. The project aims to provide a unified, high-throughput, low-latency platform for handling real-time data feeds. Apache Kafka is based on the commit log, and it allows users to subscribe to it and publish data to any number of systems or real-time applications.

entry.name: linkedin-editing
entry.description: The Linkedin-editing identifies the editing activity on the LinkedIn website and mobile apps which includes editing the profile info, changing the profile picture, editing or deleting the existing posts.

entry.name: panorama-interconnect
entry.description: The Panorama™ Interconnect plugin enables you to establish a Panorama Controller that manages Panorama Nodes and centralizes configuration management for consistent firewall configurations and policies across large-scale firewall deployments.

entry.name: protonmail
entry.description: ProtonMail is an end-to-end encrypted email service. ProtonMail uses client-side encryption to protect email contents and user data before they are sent to ProtonMail servers, unlike other common email providers such as Gmail and Outlook.com.

entry.name: secs-gem
entry.description: This app-id identifies SECS/GEM(SEMI Equipment Communication Standard/Generic Equipment Model) protocol traffic.

entry.name: twitter-editing
entry.description: The Twitter-editing application identifies traffic associated with user activity on Twitter for updating the profile info and deleteing the existing profile picture.

entry.name: twitter-uploading
entry.description: The Twitter-uploading application identifies traffic associated with user activity on Twitter for uploading the profile picture, uploading picture or video in a tweet.

entry.name: vmware-update
entry.description: VMware vSphere Update Manager (VUM) is software for automating patch management which enables centralized, automated patch and version management for VMware vSphere and offers support for VMware ESXi hosts, virtual machines, and virtual appliances. Update Manager Download Service (UMDS) provides the bridge for vSphere Update Manager to receive its patch and update binaries. This appid covers the traffic between public VMware server and VUM or UMDS, but does not cover the internal traffic between VCenter, VUM, UMDS, and managed ESXi hosts.
